PATIENT_ID: TEST_PELVIC_003
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-20 20:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-20 20:10:00
Category I activation for 50-year-old male. MVC.
Pelvic fracture noted on initial survey. Pelvic ring injury suspected.
BP 94/60, HR 112, RR 22, GCS 15.

[IMAGING] 2026-02-20 20:30:00
Pelvic x-ray obtained. Fracture identified but not characterized.
Ring pattern stability not assessed on plain film.
CT pelvis not yet obtained.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-20 20:45:00
Pelvic injury confirmed on x-ray. Extent unclear.
No documentation of hemodynamic trend relative to pelvic source.
No CT for fracture characterization obtained.
No assessment for associated genitourinary injury.
No binder placement documented.
Resuscitation in progress. Awaiting CT when stable.
